histogram.name: ChromeOS.CrosAudioConfig.DeviceChange
histogram.summary: Recorded when the user changes either the input or output audio device from a WebUI, such as the OS Audio Settings page. Not recorded when the audio device is programmatically changed.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.CrosAudioConfig.InputDeviceTypeChangedTo
histogram.summary: Records the type of device selected when the user changes the input audio device from a WebUI, such as the OS Audio Settings page. Not recorded when the audio device is programmatically changed.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.CrosAudioConfig.InputGainSetTo
histogram.summary: Records the input gain set by the user from a WebUI, such as the OS Audio Settings page. To account for changes via a UI slider, the histogram is only recorded after the user stops changing the gain for a predetermined amount of seconds.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.CrosAudioConfig.InputMuteStateChange
histogram.summary: Recorded when the user changes the input audio mute state from a WebUI, such as the OS Audio Settings page.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.CrosAudioConfig.NoiseCancellationEnabled
histogram.summary: Recorded when the user enables/disables noise cancellation from a WebUI, such as the OS Audio Settings page.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.CrosAudioConfig.OutputDeviceTypeChangedTo
histogram.summary: Records the type of device selected when the user changes the output audio device from a WebUI, such as the OS Audio Settings page. Not recorded when the audio device is programmatically changed.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.CrosAudioConfig.OutputMuteStateChange
histogram.summary: Recorded when the user changes the output audio mute state from a WebUI, such as the OS Audio Settings page.

histogram.name: ChromeOS.CrosAudioConfig.OutputVolumeSetTo
histogram.summary: Records the output volume set by the user from a WebUI, such as the OS Audio Settings page. To account for changes via a UI slider, the histogram is only recorded after the user stops changing the volume for a predetermined amount of seconds.
